TRUNCATE TABLE ec_role; INSERT INTO `ec_role`(`RoleName`,`DESCRIPTION`,`createTime`,`createBy`,`lastUpdateTime`,`lastUpdateBy`) VALUES ('管理员','管理员','2013-10-23 16:31:03','18761640621','2013-10-24 13:48:12','18061699273');
TRUNCATE TABLE ec_role_resource; INSERT INTO ec_role_resource SELECT er.id ,eres.id FROM ec_resource eres,ec_role er WHERE er.RoleName='管理员'
TRUNCATE TABLE ec_user_role; INSERT INTO ec_user_role SELECT eu.id,er.id FROM ec_user eu,ec_role er WHERE eu.mobileNumber IN('13951885586');
